definition: to bake/to heat by fire/to set off by contrast
tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)

sentences.english: Dryer, which makes your fine hair full and tangly .
sentences.chinese: 烘干机，使您的氄充分和纠缠。
在衣物烘干机中找到钱。

sentences.english: The gold landed in their stockings drying beside the fireplace.
sentences.chinese: 这些金子掉入她们挂在壁炉烘干的长袜中。

sentences.english: Washing and drying full loads is also more cost-effective in terms of power and water consumption.
sentences.chinese: 一次性洗好和烘干所有的衣服更加节能和节水。

sentences.english: Electronic temperature control offering high degree of accuracy for consistent drying.
sentences.chinese: 采用电子温度控制，提供精密的均匀烘干效果。

sentences.english: Wash your bras by hand, and never put them in the dryer or sun-dry them.
sentences.chinese: 手洗文胸，不要放在烘干机里或晒干。

sentences.english: A feeding funnel is added, and the mechanized drying for dilute fluid is realized.
sentences.chinese: 并增加了进料斗，使稀液体的烘干实现机械化。

sentences.english: Results Oven dry after steaming with peel, the content of phosphatide in Raidx Cynanchum bungei Decne was highest.
sentences.chinese: 结果带皮蒸后烘干的白首乌磷脂含量最高。

sentences.english: Mainly for medical permeating and drying of stripe medicine such as band-aid infusion band .
sentences.chinese: 主要用于创可贴，输液贴的药条浸药，烘干。

sentences.english: Cloth treated on one side with a drying oil or synthetic resin.
sentences.chinese: 一边用烘干油或合成树脂处理过的布料。

sentences.english: Line a baking sheet with baking paper.
sentences.chinese: 排上带烘烤纸的烘干板。

sentences.english: Knowledge of washing and pre-drying of all flatwork items.
sentences.chinese: 能够洗涤和烘干所有平烫物品。

sentences.english: The warehouses have certified truck scales and railroad, as well as grain dryers.
sentences.chinese: 该仓库有认证的车重计量器和铁路以及粮食烘干机。

sentences.english: The use of nano-electric membrane technology, drying clothes in the clothes inside.
sentences.chinese: 运用纳米电热膜技术，可在衣服内烘干衣物。

sentences.english: The picture shows the Russian floor-drying workshop in Heilongjiang Mingshan Farm.
sentences.chinese: 图为名山农场俄罗斯地板块烘干车间。

sentences.english: Boiler is provided face of positive and negative is washed instantly after be being used, and must stoving .
sentences.chinese: 锅具使用完后立即清洗正反面，而且一定要烘干。

definition: to bake/to heat by fire/to set off by contrast
to lay sth out to dry
to heat/to add warmth/to raise temperature/fig. to stimulate
